tool_description: SpellCheck API helps you to correct spelling mistakes in any language on the planet.
name: SpellCheck
title: SpellCheck

api_list.name: SpellCheck
api_list.description:
Returns the correct sentence after fixing the spelling mistakes. 

Maximum limit: 20 words (15 words recommended)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spellcheck7.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spellcheck7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spellcheck7.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spellcheck7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
